message: I think this is a fair split, considering I'm the one making the first offer.  Let's get this over with!
Alice, let's be reasonable. I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor.  This is more than fair considering the inflation and the fact that I get to make the next offer if you decline.
I'm willing to give you a little more this time, Bob, but I'm not going to let you take advantage of the inflation. Let's split this fairly.
